item.title: DOC
item.description: score:28 Chances: Healthpeak Properties, Inc. is a leading owner, operator, and developer of real estate for healthcare discovery and delivery. The merger with Physicians Realty Trust positions Healthpeak well to capitalize on industry trends. Risks: Net income has dipped while revenue grows, indicating potential financial challenges.
